publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3811 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Commonwealth Games 2014 in Stirling—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Executive on encouraging major world sporting events to come to Scotland; welcomes the benefits that will accrue to provincial towns and cities and all other areas of our country, and asks that Stirling is considered to provide hotel and training base facilities for the national sports teams competing in the Commonwealth Games 2014.

S2M-3811 Dr Sylvia Jackson: Commonwealth Games 2014 in Stirling—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Executive on encouraging major world sporting events to come to Scotland; welcomes the benefits that will accrue to provincial towns and cities and all other areas of our country, and asks that Stirling is considered to provide hotel and training base facilities for the national sports teams competing in the Commonwealth Games 2014.

S2M-3811 Commonwealth Games 2014 in Stirling (lodged on 12 January 2006) Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Robin Harper*, Jackie Baillie*, Christine May*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Brian Adam*, Karen Gillon*, Trish Godman*
S2M-3811 Commonwealth Games 2014 in Stirling (lodged on 12 January 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
